subject: Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Reggie Leach, the high-scoring nonbully of the 1974 and ’75 Stanley Cup teams, is celebrated in song but has yet to be nominated to the Hall of Fame, as Coach Fred Shero has been.
snippet: Reggie Leach, the high-scoring nonbully of the 1974 and ’75 Stanley Cup teams, is celebrated in song but has yet to be nominated to the Hall of Fame, as Coach Fred Shero has been.
